game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on an epic adventure to find the long-lost treasure of the ancient civilization.

task.description: Visit the old library and search for a clue on the location of the treasure map.
Crack the ancient code to decipher the hidden message on the treasure map.
Brave the dangers of the enchanted jungle and follow the map to the location of the treasure.
Reach the sacred shrine and unlock the hidden chamber to find the treasure chest.
Bring the treasure chest to Captain William and claim your reward.
